alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:02PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Madison and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 702 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Divide to 11 miles southwest of Silver Star to near Twin Bridges. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Twin Bridges, Silver Star and Waterloo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
